note: and 31-35 of the '761 patent was filed by third party requester. The request was assigned Control No. 90/010,591 (the' 10591 proceeding).
title: the Office issued U.S
a request for ex parte reexamination of claims 1
On September 25, 2009, the Office issued an order granting the '10591 request for ex parte reexamination of claims 1
On February 9, 2010, the Office issued an order granting the '1261 request for inter partes reexamination of claims 1-16,21,23-26,29, and 31-34 of the '761 patent

the Office, sua sponte, issued a decision merging the '10591 and '1261 proceedings. The decision stated that "[t]he examiner will conduct reexamination in the merged proceeding for claims 1-16,21-29, and 31-35 ofthe '761 patent

container-title: the Office issued a Right of Appeal Notice

title: On February 4, 2011, inter partes requester filed a notice of appeal
inter partes requester filed an appellant's brief
On May 4, 2011, patent owner filed a respondent's brief
On September 28, 2011, the Office issued an examiner's answer
On October 28, 2011, inter partes requester filed a rebuttal brief
the proceeding was docketed to the Board of Patent Appeals and Interferences
